data.benefits: Scheme provides support of Rs. 15 lakhs for startups for product development, marketing and other activities.
data.eligibility: All units registered as a startup and have DPIIT startup registration are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
Repayment in 24 EMIs for loans up to Rs.5 Lakhs and 36 EMIs for loans above Rs.5 Lakhs.
The startup director should have a good CIBIL Score, preferably more than 750.
The startup must be working on an innovative product or technology. 
The seed fund is not generally given for service startups and SMEs working in trade and commerce.
The startups shall not have any other pending dues with any of the Government agencies, KSUM, Other incubators in the state and shall not be blacklisted by any Govt. agency in India.
data.beneficiaries: All units registered as a startup and have DPIIT startup registration are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Repayment in 24 EMIs for loans up to Rs.5 Lakhs and 36 EMIs for loans above Rs.5 Lakhs.
The startup director should have a good CIBIL Score, preferably more than 750.
The startup must be working on an innovative product or technology. 
The seed fund is not generally given for service startups and SMEs working in trade and commerce.
The startups shall not have any other pending dues with any of the Government agencies, KSUM, Other incubators in the state and shall not be blacklisted by any Govt. agency in India.
data.context:
1. Government of Kerala has introduced the Seed Support scheme to provide financial assistance to startups to foster the formation and development of innovative, technology-based business enterprises that will stimulate the economy of the State of Kerala through venture creations, increased employment and leveraging of private investment.
  2. This scheme is implemented through Kerala Startup Mission, which is the nodal agency of Government of Kerala for startup related activities and schemes.
data.objective: The basic idea of seed support is providing financial assistance as soft loans to startups with new and meritorious ideas, innovations and technologies.
data.description:
The scheme provides Seed Fund of Rs.15 Lakhs at a subsidised interest rate of 6% per annum.
Moratorium of 12 months.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://startups.startupmission.in/login
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Address/ID proof of founder signing the agreement
2. Address/ID proof of witness signing the agreement
3. Personal Guarantee of the startup
4. Scanned copy of passbook front page of the company account.
5. Rs.200 worth Stamp paper in name of the company.
6. Other relevant documents (as required)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: G3B, Thejaswini, Technopark Campus, Kariyavattom, Trivandrum, Kerala 695581
Ph. No : 08047180470
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing and Service Industry - Limited Liability Partnership (LLP), Private Limited Company - Kerala - All MSMEs and Non-MSMEs
